modName: The Elderscrolls V Skyrim Jasmin ENB
summary: I present you The Elderscrolls V Skyrim Jasmin ENB, made by the most famous enb graphics modder in Korea.
descriptionHtml:
The Elderscrolls V Skyrim Jasmin ENB v3.3 
 
 
 
Specifications of Jasmin\'s System: CPU E6600 Core2Duo/ 3G Ram/ GPU GTS250 early model

Tested OS: windows 7  32 bit/   latest window update/  


The author only used some retexture mods while testing this enb. 

 

 
 
Instructions to use Jasmin ENB v3.3 <PC>
 

1. Open SkyrimPrefs.ini located in My Document\\My Games\\Skyrim
 

2. Find the line, bFloatPointRenderTarget=0 from [Display] tap, and replace the number 0 with 1
   Save and exit   
   If that command line doesn\'t exist, input manually. This is a must to activate all the functions to use enb.
     

3. Make sure you don\'t use other graphic mods. If you have some installed already, delete those. 

   
4. When you extract Jasmin ENB v3.3.zip, you would find 4 versions.

   DOF-(Low)
   DOF-(Medium)
   DOF-(High)
   DOF-(Ultra)
 
   They represent the intensity of Depth of Field effect.


Choose one of them to your taste :) And open the folder. 
Copy all the contents including d3d9.dll and paste them 
into your Skyrim folder (not Data folder)
  
 
5. (Optional) I would recommend Installing any HD retexture mods as you desire and it would help the game look much, much better. In case you\'re worrying about frame drop due to low system specifications, I recommend the following retexture mods.

  
    Hybrids HD Plants and Herbs Retexture 
    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1546
  
    83Willows -101BugsHD- Butterfly Dragonfly Luna-Moth Torchbug 
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4955
 
    Pure Waters - Adaptive Flow
    http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1111
 
    Real Ice ALL-IN-ONE 
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5388
 
    Improved_LOD_trees 
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6245#content
 
    Real_Snow_Flakes
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4252
 
    Better Butterflies
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4082
 
    HD Furniture and barrels final __ hi-res texture replacer  
    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=238 
 
    Lush Grass
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3288
  
    1024x1024 HQ chicken 
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2850&navtag=file/images.php?id=2850&tab=3#content
 
    High Quality Food and Ingrediants (Partially Retextured)
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=280&navtag=file/images.php?id=280&tab=3
  
    High Quality Food and Ingredients (Retextured mostly)
    http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1192
 
 
6. To uninstall, all you have to do is deleting d3d9.dll from your Skyrim folder.





Mod Introduction (Jasmin ENB v3.3)
 
I confidently introduce Jasmin ENB and it\'s the outcome of a lot of user feedbacks.
Thanks for all the feedbacks I\'ve given and those I would get :)

Changelog v3.3

Focused more on optimization (frame rates and loading speed up) and 
worked on some graphical effects.
 
Jasmin ENB can always be modified and shared with the author\'s permission.

The most important content of ENB is a palette file which has bmp as the file extension.
Modify the palette with photoshop first, and then configure enbseries.ini based on it.

Depth of Field effect used and modified in this ENB: Cinematic Setting 2.0.2 by Matso
The palette file used here: http://enbdev.com/palette_en.htm

You can press Shift+F12 to turn on and off the enb. You can provisionally increase loading speed
if you turn it off before loading.
 



A tip to improve loading speed:

Open Skyrim.ini contained in My Document\\My Games\\Skyrim.
Find [Display] tap and add the line, iPresentInterval=0

It basically turns off V-sync and it would help increasing loading speed.




Scrapped from: http://blog.naver.com/r6angel/120151409527
Author\'s e-mail: r6angel@naver.com


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This graphics patch is an outcome of many user feedbacks in Korean Skyrim Forum.

Also, this is one of his tons of works here: http://blog.naver.com/r6angel?Redirect=Log&logNo=120150356837 

He covered many other popular games\' enbs as well, including Batman Arkham City, Battlefield 3, Saints Row 3, Call of Duty Modern Warfare 3, Mafia 2, Deus EX HR, FIFA 2012, PES 2012, Dead Island, Crysis 2, Bullet Strom, Bio Shock 2.. 

If you do like this patch, please endorse it :) And feedbacks are always welcome.


All credit goes to:

The develpoer of ENB, Boris Vorontsov : http://enbdev.com/

Matso (Depth of Field effect from Cinematic Settings v2.0.2) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5587

Jasmin (Author of this file) : http://blog.naver.com/r6angel
author: Jasmin
